Rule Notes: Complete two courses of 3+ credits at the Intermediate or Advanced level in MATH, COMP SCI, or STAT subjects.
Constraints / Details: Maximum of one COMP SCI course and one STAT course may count toward this requirement.

Rule Notes: Complete the third unit of a language other than English.
Complete L&S breadth distribution across Humanities, Social Science, and Natural Science.
Constraints / Details: Humanities: 12 credits (must include ≥6 credits of Literature). Social Science: 12 credits. Natural Science: 12 credits (must include 6 Biological Science + 6 Physical Science).

Rule Notes: Complete at least 108 credits of Liberal Arts and Science coursework.
Complete at least 60 credits at the Intermediate or Advanced level.
Declare and complete at least one major.

Constraints / Details: Complete both: (1) 30 credits in residence overall; and (2) 30 credits in residence after the 86th credit.

Rule Notes: Meet minimum GPA requirements at UW–Madison.
Constraints / Details: Earn at least 2.000 GPA in (1) all coursework at UW–Madison; and (2) Intermediate/Advanced level coursework at UW–Madison.
